snippet.title: SaGa Emerald Beyond - Tokyo Game Show Trailer
snippet.description:
SaGa Emerald Beyond, coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation®5 and PlayStation®4, STEAM, iOS and Android in 2024.

FORGE YOUR OWN TALE

The latest standalone entry in the SaGa franchise, SaGa Emerald Beyond, brings together the very best elements of the beloved series to offer each player their own unique gameplay experience.

As players venture across 17 mysterious worlds, they will forge their own unique branching stories that unfold based on their very own choices and actions. With multiple endings and countless scenes to discover, players will experience a unique tale upon each playthrough!

Follow us for all the latest on SaGa Emerald Beyond:
Website: https://sagafranchise.square-enix-games.com/games/sgeb
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/SaGaGame
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/SquareEnix
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/SquareEnix
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@SquareEnix
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@SquareEnix
#SaGaEmeraldBeyond
